document_data.mainbody:
Bralzaer Windriver was the youngest son of Sabrast Windriver in the mid-14 century DR.
Per his father, Sabrast Windriver, Bralzaer had founded a mercenary company out of Sembia named Bralzaers Bold Basilisks.
In a revel on , Sabrast Windriver explained he wasnt sending his youngest son any money.
